snippet.title: Souldiers - Accolade Trailer
snippet.description:
Souldiers had some great previews and here is our selection!
💜 Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/3vGLgel
💜 Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/souldiersgame

📅 Souldiers will be out on June 2nd 
on PC, Nintendo Switch, Xbox and PlayStation

⚔️ What is Souldiers?
Fight for your freedom in a sprawling fantasy world caught between the living and the fallen. Hone your skills in a retro epic featuring puzzle platforming, metroidvania exploration and crunchy soulslike combat.
